DataElement.preferredDefinition: Free text field for the name of the assay procedure.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting._A qualitative or quantitative analysis performed to determine the amount of a particular constituent in a sample or the biological or pharmacological properties of a drug.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.

Concepts.definition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.

Property.preferredDefinition: The determination of the amount of a particular constituent of a mixture or of the biological or pharmacological potency of a drug.

Concepts.definition: A qualitative or quantitative analysis performed to determine the amount of a particular constituent in a sample or the biological or pharmacological properties of a drug.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Tests, examinations, evaluations used to determine a subject's status or response to intervention.
ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: Created initially to support CCR value domain for CTMS.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 6-3-20 released/MM. 3-30-20 tmt created for Seed Study.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The terminology subset that includes terms relevant to the Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium (CDISC) variables._The words or language units by which a thing is known.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An organizational header for concepts representing mostly abstract entities.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The terminology subset that includes terms relevant to the Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium (CDISC) variables.:The words or language units by which a thing is known.

Concepts.definition: The terminology subset that includes terms relevant to the Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium (CDISC) variables.
The words or language units by which a thing is known.
